description: If there are queued messages for a worker, it will start to read them before startService is called.  The manager for the network is set in startService, so the worker will throw an exception trying to call the method.
title: Existing Messages in the queue break the workers.

comments.content: If there are queued messages for a worker, it will start to read them before startService is called.  The manager for the network is set in startService, so the worker will throw an exception trying to call the method.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
